attributes.additional_details:
We want all non-attributable static and mobile speed camera data published.

This should include; date, time, camera type, speed limit, alleged speed and location.

It should be published frequently via the data.gov.uk website.

Currently the UK is signed up to the G8 Open Data Charter of which transport is explicitly a high value area but this information is not open. This is not a request under the FOIA as this data is currently not collected by the DfT (or any other department).
